entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Deline
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deline Airport 02:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %

Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 32.
